tool_description: Creates visual representations and maps of warehouse layout including zones, bins, aisles, and current inventory distribution for operational planning and navigation.

visualization_type.description: Type of layout view: floor_plan, zone_overview, bin_detail, heat_map

show_inventory.description: Include current inventory levels in visualization

highlight_zones.description: Specific zones to highlight in the layout

error_messages: Invalid warehouse_id: Warehouse must exist and have defined layout data.
Invalid visualization_type: Must be one of [floor_plan, zone_overview, bin_detail, heat_map].
Invalid highlight_zones: One or more specified zones do not exist in this warehouse.
Insufficient layout data: Warehouse layout is not sufficiently defined for visualization.
usage: Provide warehouse_id and optionally specify visualization_type, show_inventory, and highlight_zones to generate customized warehouse layout views.

layout_data.description: Structured layout information for rendering the warehouse map

dimensions.description: Overall warehouse dimensions and scale information

legend.description: Legend explaining symbols and color coding used in visualization
